scripts.security:audit:lenient: pnpm audit --audit-level high --prod || echo 'Security audit completed with warnings'
scripts.security:check: pnpm run security:audit:lenient && pnpm run lint
scripts.security:test: pnpm run security:audit && pnpm run lint
scripts.accessibility:test: echo 'Running accessibility tests for docs...' && node ../../scripts/accessibility-test.js
scripts.accessibility:pa11y: pa11y http://localhost:3001 --standard WCAG2AA --reporter json --output accessibility-pa11y-report.json || true
scripts.accessibility:comprehensive: pnpm run accessibility:test && pnpm run accessibility:axe && pnpm run accessibility:pa11y
